website_summaries.verdict: This high-capacity tea box offers good quality and extras like a side drawer.
pros: Framed acrylic top for easy tea viewing
8 compartments, capable of holding 126 tea bags
Tea can be stored horizontally or vertically
Side drawer for loose teas, infusers, accessories
cons: Acrylic lid comes with a sticky protective cover that is difficult to get off
Some quality issues with the lid not closing or the drawer sticking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tea box
customer_reviews.text: I want to make a tea station in my house, so I ordered this fancy box, it’s is so delicate, fits 8 different variety of tea 18-20 each box, you can put the tea spoon, it will be amazing if it could be engraved with initials o name. Perfect as a gift. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ginevra

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger replacement for my smaller tea chest. I love that this fits tea bags standing up or laying down because I'm able to fit a lot more in it. The drawer is a little small, but fit my Teavana perfect tea scoop perfectly, along with the reusable tea bags I have for loose leaf tea. It fits Twinnings, Bigelow, and Tazo tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea chest
customer_reviews.text: I love the tea chest. I thought I had a lot of tea, but it didn't fill the whole chest, so I needn't have worried about having too much tea to fit. The drawer is very small, but it holds my bag squeezer, which is one of the main things I wanted stored there. The chest looks good sitting out on my table and I'm reminded that I can have a nice cup of tea whenever I see it. It was a good purchase and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rowcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Modern and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: The chest is beautiful! It is well constructed, and elegant to use. The cover comes with a protective paper covering, so that it won't be scratched in shipping. The picture is a bit misleading. While the color, and wood features are exactly as shown, the picture shows tea bags in the compartments, and tea spoons in the drawer. Neither of these are supplied. I was very pleased, and will be glad to recommend this to others, and buy again, should the opportunity arise.
customer_reviews.author: William Lander

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I bought two...one for decaf/herbal teas and one for caffeinated teas. My tea cabinet is much more organized looking and I can see how much tea I have at a glance rather than peering inside a box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Tea box I have purchased,and this one is a gift. I liked the first one so much, it was an easy choice. Excellent build quality, deep storage sections for a variety of teas. The bonus with this one is the large storage drawer on the side. Fits a tea strainer perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with the lightning fast shipping! It was well packed as well. The box is a little smaller than expected, but that was okay with me because I have a smallish kitchen with limited counter space. The quality is pretty good, and it makes storing different types of tea more convenient that the boxes that they come in from the store. Overall, I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love my BAMBOO Tea Box. Finally my tea isn't spilling out of boxes in my cupboard. It is not only beautiful but has plenty of storage space. I bought it for a gift but loved it so much I kept it for myself. I will have to reorder another one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stachowiak

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This storage box is beautiful! The bamboo glows and it definitely held all my bagged teas. It's also well made. I tend to use more loose leaf but I would definitely gift it to friends and family who have more bagged teas than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally know what teas I have
customer_reviews.text: I've eyed this tea chest for a while and just decided to get it. I'm happy I did. I know what teas I have and what needs to be replenished. Plus it leaves me with more room in the cupboard by tossing out all of the boxes that the tea comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Cres

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The drawer on the side is actually too small to hold teaspoons or even honey sticks and slides in and out with no hinges holding it in place. The magnets the top that should keep the lid closed and sealed failed to do so as they are not strong enough to hold the lid closed because of this you cannot put the Tea box on its side and if it where to fall everything would spill out. Additionally for the reason of the drawer there are two sections where you can barely put any tea at all not worrying considering the drawer just falls out and isn’t deep enough to old loose tea leaves either
customer_reviews.author: Jaclynn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter thinks it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, for her birthday, and she loves it. She said it's perfect for her family and Bible study ladies. She loves the window top, and little drawer. I prefer bamboo, because it wears so much better than wood.
customer_reviews.author: Annette J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yourself or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This box is beautifully crafted and has plenty of storage. I bought the Bigelow 6 ok of black teas and they all fit! With 2 extra cubbies for my herbal teas. I use the side drawer for extra packets of sweetener. Highly recommended for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a tea drinker. Got this for him to put his teas in, which keeps them organized and easy to see. There is a little drawer under the right side to very small things in, probably tea spoons. Thought it might be big enough to hold a metal tea leaf infuser, but not so much. However, he likes it, I like it, so it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: patriciavonhartmann

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done, enough space for standard tea bags
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done, enough space for standard tea bags, but not enough for large ones like Mighty Leaf. But there is none on the market for that size. So, I am happy with this one and it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: ruth sabag

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I had my obnoxious variety of teabags stored in ziploc backs for so long. I love this chest! Ny mom saw it in my kitchen and thought it was beautiful and BAM! Christmas present! She was so envious, I k ow she will love it!! ( she is also a tea fanatic)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: simple little thing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend who has many tea packs. He really loved this gift, since he has always wanted one, as well as the bamboo wood. We both love the little glass/plastic window on the cover, although mine came a bit dirty/scratchy which I did not like much. Although it is a bit smaller than I thought, it's still convenient to us since it easily fits and tucks away in a kitchen cabinet. Quite the top notch box.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift.  My son is tea lover and he chose it.
customer_reviews.text: This tea box holds a lot of tea. I think the little drawer is very cute. You can put very tiny spoons in it.
customer_reviews.author: WA customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this tea box. Packaged tea stands up well in the larger compartments. With the teas that I am using a whole box of 20 will fit in the compartment but they are squished. I would say 15 fit comfortably and attractively for display. I enjoy woodworking and want to make a tea box myself, but this one will do great in the meantime. The woodwork is well done. There is one divider in my box that is slightly loose, but a little hot glue will fix that. Overall I am very impressed at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship. Excellent functionality.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect tea box for what I was looking for. It is beautifully done, and the wood is lovely. I was able to fit most of my teas in it, making room in my pantry. The drawer holds my monk fruit sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Elke B. Speliopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it for his ink jars (for nice pens), ans works great. Very nice case.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to present bagges teas.
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. It keeps different teas sorted, and easy for guests to look over a selection.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This box is absolutely perfect, it is exactly what i was looking for. It looks fantastic in my kitchen and the size is just right. It holds plenty and the dividers make it easy to keep all of the different teas organized. The small drawer on the side is an excellent touch. I am completely satisfied with this box, I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Tea case
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and he loved it The quality was very good
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: ... a few days ago and the box is not good quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got the package a few days ago and the box is not good quality, especially for the price. I recommend going somewhere else to purchase an item like this. The edges of the box were all chipped near the glass and it was just a flimsy product overall.
customer_reviews.author: lawgeek

customer_reviews.title: I'm Excited!!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo excited to give this as a Christmas gift!! The box is very well made! I love the deep sections for the teas, and the side drawer is perfect for loose tea! I know the recipient will be impressed!
customer_reviews.author: pinchy back

customer_reviews.title: If you're a tea lover, you'll love this box
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this tea box. Good quality, and lots of storage. The only issue is that the little drawer sticks. Would also be great if the drawer were large enough to fit honey sticks, or something longer than a small spoon. Overall I am very pleased with the order, and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea box
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea box!!!!! The compartments are pretty deep so it holds quite a bit of tee bags and the little drawer on the side is perfect for some honey packets!! It's constructed really well and looks to be of very good quality. Would definitely buy again. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for tea drinkers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. Holds a lot of tea bags and shows them off nicely. The box is well crafted and beautiful to look at. Using it to display my tea collection and accessories. Highly recommend this item. It would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: John Schwermer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Light weight, sturdy, and beautiful!!! It came quickly, and I am already enjoying it. Bravo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fink

customer_reviews.title: This tea box is WONDERFUL! It's tall enough to stand up full size ...
customer_reviews.text: This tea box is WONDERFUL! It's tall enough to stand up full size tea bags in the 3 left compartments. I put stevia packets in the 2 right compartments. The box is well made and sturdy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed and executed tea box
customer_reviews.text: I inspected this upon arrival and was pleasantly convinced that it would be a suitable gift for my spouse's birthday. It is thoughtfully designed, well made, and carefully packaged to prevent against damage as well as exactly as described online. The customer service is especially conscientious; they ensure you are aware of its delivery status and want to ensure your satisfaction. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. I would recommend it for any tea lover
customer_reviews.author: Michele  Chartrand

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's Christmas List
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bamboo Tea Chest for my 16 year old granddaughter along with a tea mug. She loves it. Her excitement upon opening it warmed my heart. I was impressed with the sturdy construction of the box and the great bamboo feel and look. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and arrived in two or three days
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and arrived in two or three days . This is being given as a gift so I can not give any other reviews
customer_reviews.author: tom farrell

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea box 2 years ago to put in my office so that I could share tea with clients. I love it! It's elegant and a perfect fit for my office. I really enjoy the clear top that allows me to see at a glance which teas need to be restocked, and my clients comment often on the large assortment of teas that it holds. It has become quite popular with my clients and coworkers alike! My one complaint is that the side drawer gets stuck pretty easily, and I can no longer open it. That was a small luxury, however, and not using it does not impact my satisfaction with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: would have love to give it 5
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to give this tea box a 5 but the picture is misleading. You can not fit spoons in the drawer unless they were baby spoons. Also you can only fit the Bigelow size tea bags in the sections. I would have rather had less compartments that were bigger and the drawer was a waste. It is too small and it gets stuck all the time
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great .
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful .Holds a lot of tea bags .
customer_reviews.author: DUCK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: I love tea box! Love the natural bamboo wood . High quality and perfect to store your favorite teas!
customer_reviews.author: shappy

customer_reviews.title: Good box, bad drawer.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tea box! I like the clear lid, it came well protected so no worries on breakage or scratches. The compartments are a great size for you tea, the lid shuts nicely, but the side drawer is too stiff to use convieniently, it is difficult to pull out and if you pull it out it is difficult to push back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mlarson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!!! I would purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave a review but I absolutely Love my Tea box. It is Beautiful!! And it was boxed really well for shipping and came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it! It was the perfect gift to organize ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for mother’s day. She absolutely loved it! It was the perfect gift to organize her tea in. Super cute and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product arrives as described
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, delivered as described. Holds a large number of teas. Very organized. Lid stays up and is sturdy. Like the glass, makes the display of tea seem very inviting Very happy with this tea chest
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy w this product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exceedingly fast! I was very happy w this product. The box is beautiful in its simplicity and extremely well constructed. Held way more tea bags than I ever expected - so many in fact that I now have a free cupboard for storage. Great product! Great customer follow up!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas gift for daughter who LOVES Tea! Arrived nicely!
customer_reviews.author: TMWood

customer_reviews.title: ... box the other day and was so very pleasantly pleased. The picture doesn't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: Received this box the other day and was so very pleasantly pleased. The picture doesn't do it justice. It's so nice with that special bamboo that is used. Beautifully made tea chest. (I bought it as a gift for someone but once I saw it I wanted one for myself) Tina from Texas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well built, it’s the best one on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks just like picture, functional, well packed and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I ordered 2!
customer_reviews.text: I love this box so much and have so many boxes of tea lying around, that I ordered 2! One for decaf (which my 9 year old daughter has claimed as "hers") and one for regular. A great gift for someone else or for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a nice looking tea box at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice looking tea box at a good price, and this delivered. Was concerned it would look cheap with the lid being a plastic and not glass, but it is actually a really nice box.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Centore Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bamboo tea box
customer_reviews.text: This tea box was a hit in our Christmas gift exchange! Nice size, well built and good capacity. Good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Larson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box! I gave this tea box as a gift to my mother-in-law and she was thrilled! She is not a huge tea drinker, but some of her best girlfriends are. So, she wanted a box to display her teas in whenever her friends came to visit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pett

customer_reviews.title: ... had it on their wedding registry and fell in love! I went back and bought one for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my friends because they had it on their wedding registry and fell in love! I went back and bought one for myself and I love it! It looks so nice and saves a lot of cabinet space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea chest
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea chest, it fits really nicely into my cabinate, looks lovely also. Finally no more searching through lots of tea boxes & my cabinet always looking messy. Very happy customer the best out there. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Katie Koe

customer_reviews.title: 4+ star.
customer_reviews.text: Timely arrival. The chest was well-secured in packing box. The protective film on both sides of lid was intact with a small corner already lifted to easily remove the film upon arrival. Drawer works...but a small nob would make it easier to open instead of the existing "notch." I come from a family of wood-workers, I wish the joints were higher quality but they aren't bad. Great customer service offered in the event the product is unsatisfactory (I am satisfied).
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how quickly this arrived! I ordered it Sunday afternoon and it was here on Monday. The quality of the chest was excellent. It didn't feel cheaply made. I read other reviews about the plastic window, so I expected that. I prefer it over glass anyway. Our tea packs fit perfectly inside the cubes. It's very nice looking. It looks great on my counter top. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: GREG HAWKINS

customer_reviews.title: The wood is nice and it's very well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this my boss who drinks tea everyday when he left and went to a new job it's very well made and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: josephine elliott

customer_reviews.title: It removes multiple tea boxes from your cabinets.  All teas are in one place.
customer_reviews.text: This tea chest is great for storing a varieties of teas. It frees up space in your cabinets. It looks good and can be a conversation piece. I’m enjoying this nifty tea chest.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tea chest
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and has good storage. I especially like the small drawer to fit utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box, very good quality and design. Was able to fit 6 full standard boxes of different teas in the 6 big slots, and used the 2 shallow slots for a few leftover random bags. The clear lid makes it very easy to see what it inside. Very happy with the purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for perfect tea chest!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for container with bins to separate tea bags. Your bamboo tea chest fit the bill. Multiple compartments that are deeper than I have seen before. Appreciate it is in bamboo. Perfect for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tea box!
customer_reviews.text: My order came exactly when expected. It was carefully packaged and my tea box is beautiful!! I had looked at less expensive boxes until I started reading the reviews. This one was a bit more expensive, but definitely worth it!! It is well constructed and displays all those teas that we're getting lost in my pantry beautifully!! Great follow up service from the seller as well!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice. We love to use and also to offer to guests. It is well made and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Magnet Jewelry Store

customer_reviews.title: Tea Box - Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tea Box. Just what I was looking for. It has six deep storage areas and two shallow storage areas(over the spoon drawer). It came well packaged, not a scratch or ding. The clear top was protected with self stick paper that was easily removable with no residue left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Exceeded my expectations!! Not sure why a lot of reviews said this was poor quality. But its definitely quality made!! What a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chun

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely constructed. Holds A LOT of tea bags! Love the clear view window to make for easier selection. The only "bump" is the small, pull out drawer on the side, is a little stiff to open and maybe could have used a lip or something to stop it from being pulled out all the way -- but that 2nd point is personal preference. Overall, very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Clare Rohan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Simply perfect tea storage box :))
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Very well made & sturdy :) simply perfect tea storage box with extra side drawer !
customer_reviews.author: Socal seller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a colleague who loves tea (and filled it with new tea). It's high quality wood, came super well packaged so that it would be protected. My coworker loves it. The spoon drawer is so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Tea Chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Tea Box for my other half and it is very well built and she loves it and the little drawer. Awesome deal and great product. It is also indeed Bamboo, and very pretty. Window on top allows you to see whats inside which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: EvolvingGeek

customer_reviews.title: Super tea box that is well made.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well made, and it holds LOTS of tea. I really love the small drawer to keep my teaspoons. The tea box looks supernice on our kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.author: Anne H.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé-she loved it. In fact I am going to order a few more on payday. These are great for holding other things as well.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the bulky tea boxes!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get rid of the tea boxes. It also adds some charm when you have all your variety of teas in one place. Great product, looks like it was built to last.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: it is a tea box speaks for itself really and what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Salvitti

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, can't wait to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This item is nice and simple yet well made. It was purchased for personal use, but I know someone who will enjoy it very much so it is turning into a gift. I might be buying another for myself though!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Karr

customer_reviews.title: So beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box. Sturdy. Perfect fit for teas, spoons and honey sticks. My mother in law is a tea addict and this was perfect for her. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIAG4949

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmenship.
customer_reviews.text: The box is expensive for what it is. The box doesn't align when it closes. Not sure if i will keep this. I was very disappointed to see the box
customer_reviews.author: Moonshine

customer_reviews.title: As described. A box to hold tea. Pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is great. Bought as a gift for my wife and it’s only been a couple of months but so far she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: brent granath

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and exactly what I was looking for. Holds more tea than I expected. Each section holds a full box of tea (except the ones right above the spoons).
customer_reviews.author: SCL

customer_reviews.title: This is well crafted and very and it looks nice on my counter
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. This is well crafted and it looks nice on my counter. I've had others, but they were flimsy and I ended up sending them back. This is perfect! My aunt was visiting me and she absolutely loved it. Thinking of getting her one for Christmas this year.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my mom. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Marylou

customer_reviews.title: Best tea box ever
customer_reviews.text: My wife just loved this tea box. We buy tea in bulk from Republic of Tea, and everything fits perfectly. I would highly recommend this to any tea lover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: improve it  !
customer_reviews.text: the compartments for the tea is ok but the little on the sides disappointing. i thought it would be at covering 1/3 or half the base. can hardly but sachets of sugar / creamer. suggestion: have slightly larger drawers and if possible on both sides of the box
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a couple of weeks ago, tea box is nicely built, good quality and bigger than I thought which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar M Lazzo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this box. Will order more for sure
customer_reviews.author: Mama j.

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice on a table or whatever you want to set it on. Very nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: richard farley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift for tea enthusiasts. Well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box! Love the magnetic closure and the spoon drawer is discreet but easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Dopplerwriter

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product by a family-owned business! I am using this in the office for our teas, it looks and feels really professional. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for. The drawer even holds my small tea spoons perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Now my husband can see all of the teas with one glance! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to replace another that didn't have deep enough slots. This one exceeded our expectations and she loves it more than any other tea box she's ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tea organizer with plenty of room to fit even the larger size tea bags...looks great on the counter too!
customer_reviews.author: Eleathea Barraclough

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great box for holding my mystical drinks from across the globe. Mine was packaged neatly and inspection yielded no damages. Very happy with the product, use it daily, and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Corey T.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her birthday and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: My Bamboo Tea Box is beautifully constructed and will last many years of daily use. I gave it Four stars because the side drawer is a tight fit and the clear plastic lid will require delicate care to prevent accidental scratching.
customer_reviews.author: SHARYN MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Many compliments. What I didn't like was when I first ordered my product it was lost and I had to finally call to find out. When tracking my package it kept saying out for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Tea Chest came exactly as ordered and is solidly ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tea Chest came exactly as ordered and is solidly made. The lid is secured by embedded magnets and that serves my uses very well. The box is frequently moved from place to place (office setting) and having the lid secured is immensely helpful. A solidly made product, at a reasonable price, that comes exactly as advertised. A first rate product.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Mentgen

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect and is well made. It was packed secured and nothing was scratched or broken. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! Gave this tea chest to my mother in law as a gift and she loves it! The quality is amazing and I love the drawer for the spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Seddon

customer_reviews.title: Great tea chest
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea chest. It is roomy, well made and very nice looking. I especially appreciate the small side drawer for spoons.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. It is well made and perfect for what I needed. The drawer on the side is useful for tiny spoons or stir sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M Ahling

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room for Our Teas
customer_reviews.text: Now our teas are in a beautiful and perfect place. And there’s room in our cupboard for other things. I highly recommend this tea holder.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sampson

product_meta.title: SOLID 100% BAMBOO Tea Box Natural Chest with Clear Hinged Lid, 8 Storage Sections with Expandable Drawer
feature_bullets: Regular Price:$49.95 FULLY UPGRADED BAMBOO TEA BOX - Taller than standard size tea box to accommodate standing or flat tea bag placement for a beautiful display. Holds 6 boxes (over 120 tea bags). The sturdy structure is enforced with nails that are almost invisible to the naked eye. Ensuring your tea box will not fall apart even after years of use.
BEAUTIFUL WARM MAO BAMBOO: Gorgeous and Strong, known for its elegant coloring and smooth finish.
NO DUST OR MOISTURE: The self-standing magnetic locking lid ensures no dust or moisture gets inside. 8 compartments 13 x 8 x 4.1

KEEP YOUR FAVORITE TEAS ORGANIZED: Ready for your guest to pick their favorites! (Tea & Spoons not included) Specially designed small drawers for store your loose leaf tea, sugar packets, spoons, squeezer and other accessories.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - Kwijns core values of providing the highest quality products and service. Patent Pending
